name: Mecha
description: Towering above the city, gargantuan kaiju tussle with towering mechas. Who will win?

skinlines.name: Kaiju
skinlines.description: From the depths of the planet, they rise: colossal entities of horror and hunger, mightier than armies and mountains. Their motivations are uncertain; their designs, unknown. The one thing that is clear is that we will not survive them... unless we create the means to stop them.

skinlines.name: Mecha
skinlines.description: When colossal kaiju begin attacking from the sea, land, and air, humanity develops equally powerful mecha units to stop them in explosive hand-to-hand combat.
